ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Chant of Battle problems
ygData.msgSnippet: I tried.  He has clarity now and so can usually handle the mana no problem. He ends up most fights with 6+ mobs at 40% mana while the clerics are medding
ygData.messageBody:
I tried. He has clarity now and so can usually handle the mana no problem.
He ends up most fights with 6+ mobs at 40% mana while the clerics are
medding during the end of the fight. He basically meds thru the fight and
pops up when things un-mez.

My Anthem is no where near as good as his haste buffs anyhow. The one time
we tried it, the other two tanks complained about being slow.

Kitasi

-----Original Message-----
From: Perhaps a Princess... [mailto:sarah@...]
Sent: Wednesday, May 03, 2000 1:13 PM
To: eqbards@egroups.com
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Chant of Battle problems


As an enchanter, I'd MUCH prefer having a bard in the battle doing the
haste.
My QUicken spell takes a LOT of mana -- more than anything else I have.
And does not last very long. If I have a bard asting, it leaves my mana free
to Debuff/Slow and Mes when others join in. (I consider crowd control
my primary. If we get extras, I don't have time to cast the haste buff
anyway. I am dealing with extra critters) You might talk to your enchanter,
see if you can take that haste duty off of their hands. Their mana bars
may very well end up loving you :) EVen with Breeze, now, I can't always
keep up.

They have quite a few other spells they can cast with extra mana --
Strength debuffs of various sorts, Color Flux, Whirl Until you Hurl,
Cancel Magic, Root (depending on what you are fighting/what comes)

Sarah Heacock sarah@...
Meara Daring, level 21 Enchanter, Master Jeweler, owner Meara's Boutique of
Mystiques, Phoenix, Solusek Ro /
Faerain Wanderer, level 20 Soldier of Tunare, Phoenix, Solusek Ro /
Faesong, level 17 HalfElf Bard of Solusek Ro, Phoenix, Solusek Ro (Qeynos) /
<lvl 6 paladin -- baby BASHer!>

>-----Original Message-----
>From: Papa Legba [mailto:legba@...]
>Sent: Wednesday, May 03, 2000 8:43 AM

>Hmmm... This could be it, still sounds like a bug to me since it isn't
>consistent. It isn't a big deal I guess, but just leaves me with no low
>level buffs that i can use when we have a good enchanter (IE one who
>would rather haste the bashers then try to be 4th rate wizard)
